title: Read plz !!!!
body:
I just recieved a chat ban for 10 games, the ban did so i couldnt recieve any keys chest or write more than 5 messages per game. The ban is now gone but still I cant recieve any keys or chests. How long will this last? Is this a bug? How long before I will recieve stuff again. 

Thanks for your responds!  b

replies.body:
Did you play and fully complete a total of 10 games? Usually if you AFK or get DC'd in a game it doesn't count. For the chat restriction at least.

For Hextech keys and loot; I don't think those rights are automatically given back once you receive a blemish on your account reputation and finish out the punishment time. I think the "average" (don't quote me  on that lol) is it takes 2-3 months of continuous positive play to get your hextech crafting privileges back. Even for a 10 game chat restriction. There is no set time when you'll get it back, but I think that's the estimated average it takes. Could be shorter or longer, it all depends on your attitude and how quickly you reformed.

[More information:](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide)

> **HOW DOES BEHAVIOR AFFECT LOOT ELIGIBILITY?**
> If you've been punished recently for negative behavior, you'll be locked out of earning chests and keys from playing games for a duration of time.
> 
> The length of time you're restricted from earning loot is relative to two things:
> 
* Severity of punishment. You won't earn loot for the duration of your punishment, be it a temporary suspension or a chat restriction.
* Signs of reform. Once your puinshment has ended, you'll continue to be restricted from earning loot until you're recognized to have made significant progress in amending your past behavior. 

>There isn't a specific timeframe for this--it all depends on your behavior.


I hope that helps :)

Thank you!
 But 2-3 months thats a long time i was toxic for three games man i guess i´ll just not write anything but again Thank you a great help!

> [{quoted}](name=BOOOOSTED ANIMAL,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LKEx7wtG,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-10-21T17:39:12.929+0000)
>
> Thank you!
>  But 2-3 months thats a long time i was toxic for three games man i guess i´ll just not write anything but again Thank you a great help!

It was probably more than 3 games, that is just the maximum number of games they show you so that they are from recent games instead of showing you something from a few days or a week ago.

The fact that you have three would lead one to believe that your punishment was due to consistent negative behavior rather than particularly offensive cases. I would suggest muting people you are about to have an argument with, as that is the case with a lot of similar instances.

Although that isn't why you are here, so sorry if I am being overly presumptuous or overanalyzing, purely trying to help. XD
Thank you anyways all great help;)

Well like I said, it all depends on how often you play and how quickly you've reformed :) It could be even a week of playing once a day if you no longer show that type of behavior anymore. I was just stating the average it can take, but it's not a definite number. It all depends on you. 

Also, the game audits more than just the 3 games you received on your reform card. It's just to give an example of what not to do that you've done, but it could have been other games in the past that you were toxic in as well that counted towards your restriction. 

I do recommend avoiding chat unless it's strictly for gameplay related purposes such as "Let's get baron" or "we should ward more". If you are prone to getting frustrated and typing in it chat it might help calm you down during games if you restrict yourself to neutral chat only :) Or even /mute all at the start of a match so you don't have to worry about others. 

Either way, I wish you luck! I hope you succeed in getting reformed and getting your Hextech Crafting back :D
